metadata.name: Madonna with a smartphone - 1|1 edition
metadata.description:
Edition 1 of 1 - "Madonna with a smartphone" is my 9th Street Art mural tokenized on the Ethereum Blockchain.

This one-of-a-kind interactive NFT is a day & night switch mode animated version of the original fresco painted during one month by Pascal Boyart in Pantin (a city near Paris), January 2020.

The fresco is composed of a young woman's portrait inspired by Bouguereau on the first facade and an open window optical illusion in the background. The two facades are connected by the black hat which appears in anamorphosis when one places oneself on the sidewalk opposite. The NFT is a interactive day & night mode that allows everyone to see an animated timelapse of the whole work and switch between day & night by clicking on the NFT.

To access the NFT [interactive webpage](https://bafybeidacsxeaslgjp4vkcphumrlpttg5o67y33fzpqubrrwwky3neudby.ipfs.dweb.link/ "https://bafybeidacsxeaslgjp4vkcphumrlpttg5o67y33fzpqubrrwwky3neudby.ipfs.dweb.link/")

To access [HD files](https://bafybeidymoupkp5e4msbhx5uh5fbqu4dfgufqawcxjjnj674sp6iya2obi.ipfs.dweb.link/ "https://bafybeidymoupkp5e4msbhx5uh5fbqu4dfgufqawcxjjnj674sp6iya2obi.ipfs.dweb.link/") of the NFT

For more info about the [IRL Mural](https://en.pboy-art.com/single-post/madone-au-smartphone "https://en.pboy-art.com/single-post/madone-au-smartphone")

To see the [making-of video](https://bafybeide2pngza4zuntzn7wsj6tddssvlbrkwpzbd4ajwexxp65m5xe6ja.ipfs.dweb.link/ "https://bafybeide2pngza4zuntzn7wsj6tddssvlbrkwpzbd4ajwexxp65m5xe6ja.ipfs.dweb.link/") of the IRL mural

To learn more about my [Street Art NFTs](https://en.pboy-art.com/nfts "https://en.pboy-art.com/nfts")
